resources.string: "When this app was first started, APN TYPE was: "

"This app enables and disables data by changing the TYPE of the current APN (Access Point Name). You have to keep "Mobile Data" turned on the be able to send/receive multimedia messages (MMS). Tap on the icon on the right or use the widget to toggle."
Error: on Android 4.0 and above, MMS Keeper needs to be converted to a system app. Root your device, then use /system/app mover or similar.
